Title: Conway's Game of Life
Description: A Windows C# app that implements a cellular automaton. Give an initial seed by clicking on the grid and making cells live or by letting the app create a random seed. Observe it evolve, control the speed of the simulation, stop it, save it or load previously saved confingurations.
HomeWiki:
A Windows app written in C# that implements a cellular automaton.
The user gives an initial seed by specifying the number of cells to be set to live and letting the app create a random seed, or by choosing which cells on the grid to be live himself. Then he can observe this initial configuration evolve â€“ die or reproduce.
The user can control the speed of the simulation, stop it, save it or load previously saved configurations
